projects.name: Sentimental Analysis using ML
projects.description: Performed sentiment analysis on a large Twitter dataset, using NLP techniques like tokenization, stemming, and lemmatization. Implemented machine learning models (Logistic Regression, SVM, Random Forest), optimizing them for high accuracy. Visualized sentiment trends using Matplotlib and Seaborn. Leveraged Python libraries (Pandas, Scikit-learn, NLTK) to enhance computational efficiency.

projects.name: Driver drowsiness detection system
projects.description: Developed a Driver drowsiness detection system with a load model function from Keras. Designed to help drivers stay awake while driving, in order to reduce the risk of accidents caused by drowsiness. Key Features: CNN: extract relevant features from images, OpenCV: Testing code, NumPy, and Matplotlib: display the test image, and to make predictions using the pre-trained CNN model.
